mapper.insert: insert into record_info (id, uid, type_uid, deleted, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typeUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update record_info set uid = #{uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type_uid = #{typeUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, uid, type_uid, deleted, create_time, update_time from record_info where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, uid, type_uid, deleted, create_time, update_time from record_info
